bio:
Yuning Liu is a Visiting Assistant Professor of Mathematics at NYU Shanghai. Prior to joining NYU Shanghai, he was assistant professor of mathematics at Universität Regensburg, Germany. He holds a PhD from Institut Élie Cartan Nancy, France.

Liu’s research interests are mathematics of fluid mechanics and control theory. His work has appeared in the SIAM Journal on Mathematical Analysis and ESAIM: Control, Optimization and Calculus of Variations.

Research Interests

  • Mathematics of fluid mechanics
  • Control theory

Courses Taught

  • Complex Variables
  • Mathematics for Economists
  • Multivariable Calculus and Differential Equations
  • Partial Differential Equations

Education

  • PhD, Applied Mathematics, Institut Élie Cartan Nancy, France, 2012
  • MA, Mathematics, Wuhan University, China, 2008
  • BS, Mathematics, Wuhan University, China, 2006
